content: e now work in garter st knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 working just with color b now work in garter st garter st ridges since switching just to color e knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 join color f and k 2 row garter st ridges since switching just to color b switch back to color e and k 2 row join color c and k 2 row with color f k 2 row switch back to color b and k 2 row with color e k 2 row with color c k 2 row with color f k 2 row with color b k 2 row with color e k 2 row cut color e making sure with color c k 2 row to leave a long tail to weave in later with color b k 2 row cut color b making sure to leave a long tail to weave in later section 6 section 3 working just with color f now work in garter st knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 working just with color c now work in garter st garter st ridges since switching just to color f knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 bobble all sts garter st ridges since switching just to color c join color d and k 2 row switch back to color c and k 2 row finishing with color d k 2 row weave in ends block if desired with color c k 2 row with color d k 2 row with color c k 2 row cut color c making sure to leave a long tail to weave in later www elizabethsmithknits com 2
